metadata.title: Why Is the Error Message "E0400009" Displayed?

sections.content:
Question:
"Could not load or assembly "ISWrapper.dll" or one of its dependencies" error message is displayed when using Workbench6. What are the possible causes?
Answer:
Please install the 32-bit version Visual C++ 2012 Runtime Library. If your OS is 64-bit OS, even if your system runs a 64-bit OS.
For details on the Visual C++ 2012 Runtime Library (32-bit), see [1.4.2 Runtime library].
Workbench6 is now in maintenance status, and we do not plan to update it in the future.
Use QE for Capacitive Touch as a support tool for developing a modern capacitive touch sensor.
QE for Capacitive Touch can be downloaded from URL below.
https://www.renesas.com/qe-capacitive-touch
Suitable Products
RX113
RX130
RX231, RX230
